org.jscsi.target

Class TargetServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jscsi.target.TargetServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<Void>

    public final class TargetServer
extends Object
implements Callable<Void>
    The central class of the jSCSI Target, which keeps track of all active TargetSessions, stores target-wide parameters and variables, and which contains the main(String[]) method for starting the program.
    Author:
    Andreas Ergenzinger, University of Konstanz, Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
